title: Quality in the Time of Covid - Dialogos
description:
Open up a portal to a new world by joining the discussion. Find a corner of the internet and become a participant. Engage in Quality dialog (Vervaeke's dialogos) - a generative meeting of the minds and souls that improves both of you. 

Also, how to treat your partner during the quarantine and after. 

https://news.sky.com/story/coronavirus-4-000-domestic-abuse-arrests-in-london-in-just-six-weeks-police-say-11978358?fbclid=IwAR0JiiJNzGU9qvhF2KltlqC0-wjRFMHt-hay4NYnOrGR11y430ZvGIMYEsA

https://forge.medium.com/a-therapists-simple-rule-transformed-my-marriage-d7bb10e5f759

Twitter: @AQualityX
